ModMetaData.name: [LYN] Add-On for Vanilla Traits Expanded
ModMetaData.author: Lyn the Cookie
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla Traits Expanded added five character Classes: Academian (Intellectual/Medicine), Ecologist (Animals/Plants), Gastronomist (Cooking/Artistic), Groundbreaker (Construction/Mining) and Tycoon (Social/Crafting). This mod adds seven more: Anatomist (Medicine/Melee), Architect (Artistic/Construction), Erudite (Social/Intellectual), Herbalist (Plants/Cooking), Hunter (Shooting/Animals), Scavenger (Crafting/Mining) and Soldier (Melee/Shooting).
